oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Last will and testament of Gen. Robert Hatton, CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Last will and testament of Gen. Robert Hatton. Hatton was born in Ohio but attended Cumberland University in Lebanon, Tenn. He practiced law and served in Congress before the war. He was elected Col., 7th Tenn. Inf. Regt." CSA and led them to Virginia in; 1861. He was promoted to Brig. Gen. in the spring of 1862 and died at Fair Oaks, Va., May 31, 1862 at the head of the Tenn. Brigade. He is buried in Cedar Grove Cemetery in Lebanon, Tenn. A statute of him was erected on the town square in Lebanon in 1912.
